title: Journal Finally Retracts Roundup Cancer Study Reliant on Monsanto Research and Ghostwriting
description: Just two days after President Donald Trump's administration sided with the maker of glyphosate-based Roundup over cancer victims in a US Supreme Court case, the scientific journal Regulatory Toxicology and Pharmacology retracted a landmark 25-year-old study o…
